notes: This map illustrates satellite-detected damage and destruction in the Hansapur area of Nepal. Located roughly seven and a half to twelve kilometers west of the 25 April 2015 earthquake epicenter, the Hansapur area was significantly impacted by this event. Using satellite imagery acquired 29 April 2015 UNITAR / UNOSAT identified a total of 145 affected structures in this area. Approximately 33 of these were destroyed, 47 severely damaged, and 65 moderately damaged. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR / UNOSAT.
